name: Microwave Mac & Cheese Bowls with Mixed Veg and Apple Slices
description: Family-friendly mac and cheese heated in minutes with a ready veg side and crisp apple slices. Zero chili heat and minimal prep.
prep_steps: Slice apples into wedges; set on a plate.
Set out 4 microwave-safe bowls and 4 forks.
Read heating times on the macaroni and cheese and mixed vegetables packages.
cook_steps: Microwave the macaroni and cheese per package directions until hot, stirring once halfway.
Microwave the mixed vegetables per package directions until hot.
Divide the macaroni and cheese into 4 bowls.
Add a serving of mixed vegetables to each bowl or on the side.
Serve with apple slices on each plate.
